findings.description: Mint without transferring underlying (unchecked transferFrom + incorrect received-amount accounting)

findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target vulnerability but is not the same. It describes a different issue related to the mint function.

findings.description: First depositor can steal any pre-existing underlying via incorrect initial exchange rate
findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: First depositor can steal any pre-existing underlying via incorrect initial exchange rate
